page.title: 03EVENTS
page.content: THOUSANDS OF VISITORS ARE ATTRACTED ANNUALLY TO THIS EVENT WHICH IS HELD ON A SATURDAY IN JULY AT H.M.S DAEDALUS. DISPLAYS SHOW THE MANY FACETS OF THE BASE BOTH PROFESSIONAL AND SOCIAL AND INCLUDE THE AIRCRAFT AND EQUIPMENT IN USE IN THE ROYAL NAVY. IN 1985 THERE WAS A DISPLAY BY THE RED DEVILS PARACHUTE TEAM AND THE SHARKS HELICOPTER DISPLAY TEAM AS WELL AS A FLY PAST OF OLD PLANES SUCH AS THE FOKKER TRI-PLANE, THE SPITFIRE AND THE TORNADO. ON THE GROUND THERE WERE ATTRACTIONS FOR ALL THE FAMILY RANGING FROM THE H.M.S DAEDALUS VOLUNTEER BAND TO THE HAMPSHIRE POLICE DOG DISPLAY TEAM. OPPORTUNITIES WERE ALSO AVAILABLE FOR THE PUBLIC TO PARTICIPATE IN SAILBOARDING, GLIDING AND SUB-AQUA DIVING.
